mainHero.title: All-Inclusive Family Planning with
mainHero.subtitle: ReproCreate
mainHero.description: Ensuring universal access to family planning via quality education, and effortless access to family planning services.

items.title: Proper Education
items.description: Non-gender selective interactive and relatable sexual and reproductive health education in preferred language .

items.title: Order Contraceptives Discreetly
items.description: Offer family planning services such as ordering a contraceptive from nearby pharmacy discreetly, and consulting an expert.

items.title: Expert Consultation
items.description: Offer family planning services such as ordering a contraceptive from nearby pharmacy discreetly, and consulting an expert.

features.title: Unique features
features.subtitle: Why we stand out!
features.description: An all-inclusive family planning approach which offers quality education, and discreet access to family planning services.

items.name: Offline Access with USSD
items.description: Ensures uninterrupted access to our services and in underserved internet connection areas thereby contributing to a holistic approach to enhancing universal family planning coverage.

items.name: ReproLearn
items.description: Non-gender selective interactive and relatable sexual and reproductive health education in preferred language .

items.name: Alternate Reminders
items.description: Contraceptive pill reminders powered by a WhatsApp chat bot ensures reminders are not lost in pool of push up notifications.

items.name: Personalized Contraceptive Suggestions
items.description: Users inputs relevant information to get perfect contraceptive suggestions thereby removing fear of Removes the fear of side effects .

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
